element.name: L1 nerve
element.branches: dorsal - medial, lateral; ventral - lower, upper
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: L1 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: medial - to multifidus, lateral - cutaneous branches, supply skin of gluteal region

element.name: L1 nerve, ventral ramus
element.distribution: lower to lumbar plexus - to genitofemoral nerve, upper - to iliohypogastric nerve, ilioinguinal nerve

element.name: L2 nerve
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: L2 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: medial - to multifidus, lateral - cutaneous branches, supply skin of gluteal region

element.name: L2 nerve, ventral ramus
element.distribution: 1 - to genitofemoral nerve, 2 - to lateral cutaneous nerve of thigh, 3 - to femoral nerve, 4 - to obturator nerve

element.name: L3 nerve
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: L3 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: medial - to multifidus, lateral - cutaneous branches, supply skin of gluteal region

element.name: L3 nerve, ventral ramus
element.distribution: 1 - to lateral cutaneous nerve of thigh, 2 - to femoral nerve, 3 - to accessory obturator nerve, 4 - to obturator nerve

element.name: L4 nerve
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: L4 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: medial - to multifidus, lateral - to erector spinae group

element.name: L4 nerve, ventral ramus
element.distribution: 1 - to femoral nerve, 2 - to lumbosacral trunk, 3 - to accessory obturator nerve, 4 - to obturator nerve

element.name: L5 nerve
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: L5 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: medial - to multifidus, lateral - to erector spinae group

element.name: L5 nerve, ventral ramus
element.distribution: 1 - to tibial part of sciatic nerve, 2 - to common peroneal part of sciatic nerve, 3 - to superior gluteal nerve, 4 - to inferior gluteal nerve
